dict.string: Palma Cathedral
The most prominent building on the skyline, set besides the sea.
Palma Cathedral
The Cathedral is know locally as Le Seu. It is 121 metres long and 40 metres wide.
The Canopy
Twice a year at about 9 AM the sunlight through the major rose window illuminates the top of the rose window in the main façade.
Fact 3
The Cathedral was started in the 13th century and is built on the site that was previously a Mosque.
Ring a bell?
The cathedral bells are named Eloi, Bàrbara, Antònia, Sa Nova, Mitja, Tèrcia, Matines, Prima and Picarol.
Belver Castle
The second most prominent building on the skyline, set besides the sea.
Fact 1
The Castle was started in 1300 and is the oldest known circular castle.
Fact 2
Parts of the castle are covered in graffiti from the days when it was used as a prison.
Fact 3
The four towers are aligned with the points of the compass, with the Keep facing North.
Ring a bell?
Most of the sandstone used to build the castle comes from the caves below the castle.
